intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to install and uninstall a feature using Install/Update.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Register the update site with Eclipse
item.description: To register the update site with Eclipse, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "Help->Software Updates->Find and Install..." from the main menu to launch the "Install/Update" wizard
Select the "Search for new features to install" radio button and click "Next >"
Click the "New Local Site..." button
Browse to "C:\helloworld.site" in the list box, select the "helloworld.site" folder and click "OK"
Input "Hello World! Update Site" into the "Name" text box of the "Edit Local Site" dialog box and click "OK"
Click "Finish"
Note an "Updates" dialog box that immediately comes into focus
Click "Cancel" to close the dialog box for now

item.title: Install the feature
item.description: To install the feature, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "Help->Software Updates->Find and Install..." from the main menu to launch the "Install/Update" wizard
Select the "Search for new features to install" radio button and click "Next >"
Click "Finish"
Again the "Updates" dialog box comes into focus. This time do not close it.
Expand the "helloworld.site" tree dialog in the "Select the features to install" list box and note the "Hello World!" feature category
Expand the "Hello World!" feature category tree dialog and note the "Hello World! Feature" feature
Select the "Hello World! Feature" text box and click "Next >"
Select the "I accept the terms in the license agreement" radio button and click "Next >"
Click "Finish" to install the feature
Click "Install" in the resulting "Verification" dialog box
Click "Yes" from the Install/Update dialog box to restart the Eclipse workbench

item.title: Verify the feature installation
item.description: To verify the feature installation, perform the following steps after Eclipse restarts:

subitem.label: Select "Help->Software Updates->Manage Configuration..." from the main menu
Fully expand the "Eclipse SDK" tree dialog
Note the "Hello World! Feature" and close the dialog box

item.title: Uninstall the feature
item.description: To uninstall the feature, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "Help->Software Updates->Manage Configuration..." from the main menu
Fully expand the "Eclipse SDK" tree dialog
Select the "Hello World! Feature" feature within the tree dialog and right-click it
Select "Uninstall" from the context menu and click "OK"
Click "OK" in the resulting "Uninstall" dialog box
Click "Yes" from the "Install/Update" dialog box to restart the Eclipse workbench
